Package mining

Class Cluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • mining.Cluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Cluster>
    class Cluster
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Cluster>, java.io.Serializable
    La classe Cluster modella un cluster. La classe Cluster implementa Comparable e Serializable
